name: star-piece
short_effect: Platinum: Trade for one of each color Shard. Black and White: Trade for PP Up. Sell for 4900 Pokédollars, or to Ore Collector for 9800 Pokédollars.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
A red gem shard.
It would sell for a
very high price.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
A red gem shard.
It would sell for a
very high price.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
A shard of a pretty gem that
sparkles in a red color.
It can be sold at a high price.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:

in a red color. It can be sold at a
high price to shops.
